title: CURRY TWO | FLASH STARRING STEPHEN CURRY & JAMIE FOXX
description:
How long does it take to change the game? Hours? Days? Years? Decades? 

Nah...In this game, it only takes a second...or less. #LightTheGameUp


The reigning NBA MVP Stephen Curry's second signature shoe drops 10.24.

asset.title: CURRY TWO | FLASH STARRING STEPHEN CURRY & JAMIE FOXX
asset.description:
How long does it take to change the game? Hours? Days? Years? Decades? 

Nah...In this game, it only takes a second...or less. #LightTheGameUp


The reigning NBA MVP Stephen Curry's second signature shoe drops 10.24. For more info, visit: undrarmr.co/CurryTwo
asset.author: Under Armour

transcripts: How long does it take to change a game of basketball to change the sport, hours, days, years, decades? How about .4 seconds just like that all of a sudden big ain’t so big no more, small ain’t so small and with a flick of the wrist to step back three is a new dunk, follow through is a new poster, range is a new hang time. From the elbow to the rim the threat now comes from everywhere it's a new age for the game a new era of champion in the world change takes time in the universe it takes eons. In this game it only takes a second or less.
